content: knitted drops dog s sweater with norwegian pattern in karisma drops extra 0-834 drops design pattern no u-655 yarn group b size xs - s - m dog s measurements chest width approx 28/32 40/44 48/52 cm / 11 /12½ - 15 3/4 /17 1/4 - 19 /20½ back length approx 24 32 - 40 cm / 9½ -12½ -15 3/4 example of dogs xs = dwarf pinscher s = bichon frisé m = cocker spaniel materials drops karisma from garnstudio 50-100-150 g color no 05 black 50-50-100 g color no 21 medium gray worked in the round on needle from the neck down drops circular needle size 3 5 mm / us 4 40 cm / 16 double pointed needles for the smallest size - or size needed to get 22 sts x 30 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 3 mm/us 2or3 for rib worked in the round on needle from the neck down
